SourceProxy.name: MyCityJSONReader
SourceProxy.label: MyCityJSON

Documentation.long_help: This plugin allows ParaView to load CityJSON files.

SourceProxy.Documentation: Loads and parses CityJSON files into ParaView. Parses the CityJSON files into points, inserts these, then parses the boundaries of each CityObject into polygons and references the points inserted earlier.

StringVectorProperty.name: FileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property specifies the file name for the CityJSON reader.
